alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Northern Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 24 at 2:11PM MST until December 26 at 11:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MONDAY TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 13 inches, highest amounts mostly east of Philip and Kadoka. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Haakon County and Northern Jackson County. * WHEN...From 5 PM Monday to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
